# Spycoprobe programmer

A Python tool for interacting with the Spycoprobe and Riotee probe.

## Installation

Install from PyPI:

```
pip install spycoprobe
```

## Usage


Halt target:

```
spycoprobe halt
```

Flash hex image:

```
spycoprobe flash -i image.hex
```

For a list of commands and options:

```
spycoprobe -h
```
